data.description: POE client to the Y windowing system.
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
I'm not going to argue the validity of this namespace. It is, in my
    opinion, not a good thing. With the current state of GUI modules on
    the CPAN there is no standard namespace. I site example: Gtk, Gtk2,
    Wx, Tk and Qt. I am of the opinion all of these modules, including
    mine, should go into a GUI:: namespace or something appropriate. But
    unless that is going to happen, I see no real choice but to request
    this top level namespace. Please email me your opinions on this
    sbeck@gossamer-threads.com.
